languages.text: "Однажды Рунный волк Лаккан поделился с нашими волчьими жрецами тайнами знахарских снадобий, врачующие раны, и секретами волшебных саг. Он научил видеть в брошенных рунах прошлое и будущее, призывать бурю и резать могучие талисманы".

traits.locale_text: "Однажды Рунный волк Лаккан поделился с нашими волчьими жрецами тайнами знахарских снадобий, врачующие раны, и секретами волшебных саг. Он научил видеть в брошенных рунах прошлое и будущее, призывать бурю и резать могучие талисманы".
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Lakkan the Runed Wolf once shared the mysteries of the healing potions and the secrets of magic sagas. He taught them to see the past and future in thrown runes, to call down storms, and to carve powerful talismans."
languages.original_text: "Однажды Рунный волк Лаккан поделился с нашими волчьими жрецами тайнами знахарских снадобий, врачующие раны, и секретами волшебных саг. Он научил видеть в брошенных рунах прошлое и будущее, призывать бурю и резать могучие талисманы".

traits.locale_text: "Lakkan the Runed Wolf once shared the mysteries of the healing potions and the secrets of magic sagas. He taught them to see the past and future in thrown runes, to call down storms, and to carve powerful talismans."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lakkan the Runed Wolf once shared the mysteries of the healing potions and the secrets of magic sagas. He taught them to see the past and future in thrown runes, to call down storms, and to carve powerful talismans."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lakkan the Runed Wolf once shared the mysteries of the healing potions and the secrets of magic sagas. He taught them to see the past and future in thrown runes, to call down storms, and to carve powerful talismans."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lakkan the Runed Wolf once shared the mysteries of the healing potions and the secrets of magic sagas. He taught them to see the past and future in thrown runes, to call down storms, and to carve powerful talismans."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “咒狼拉坎曾分享过治疗药剂的奥妙以及魔法史诗的秘密。他教会人们从抛出的符文中看到过去与未来，通过符文召唤狂风暴雨，使用符文雕刻威力强大的护身符。”
languages.original_text: "Lakkan the Runed Wolf once shared the mysteries of the healing potions and the secrets of magic sagas. He taught them to see the past and future in thrown runes, to call down storms, and to carve powerful talismans."

traits.locale_text: “咒狼拉坎曾分享过治疗药剂的奥妙以及魔法史诗的秘密。他教会人们从抛出的符文中看到过去与未来，通过符文召唤狂风暴雨，使用符文雕刻威力强大的护身符。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Lakkan, el Lobo Rúnico, compartió los secretos de las pociones curativas y de las sagas mágicas. Nos enseñó a ver el pasado y el futuro en las runas lanzadas, a llamar a la tormenta y a tallar poderosos talismanes».
languages.original_text: "Lakkan the Runed Wolf once shared the mysteries of the healing potions and the secrets of magic sagas. He taught them to see the past and future in thrown runes, to call down storms, and to carve powerful talismans."

traits.locale_text: «Lakkan, el Lobo Rúnico, compartió los secretos de las pociones curativas y de las sagas mágicas. Nos enseñó a ver el pasado y el futuro en las runas lanzadas, a llamar a la tormenta y a tallar poderosos talismanes».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「ルーンの狼ラッカンはかつて、癒しの薬の神秘と魔法のサーガの秘密を分かち合った。彼は彼らに、投げたルーンで過去と未来を見ること、嵐を呼び起こすこと、強力なタリスマンを彫ることを教えた」
languages.original_text: "Lakkan the Runed Wolf once shared the mysteries of the healing potions and the secrets of magic sagas. He taught them to see the past and future in thrown runes, to call down storms, and to carve powerful talismans."

traits.locale_text: 「ルーンの狼ラッカンはかつて、癒しの薬の神秘と魔法のサーガの秘密を分かち合った。彼は彼らに、投げたルーンで過去と未来を見ること、嵐を呼び起こすこと、強力なタリスマンを彫ることを教えた」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Lakkan der Runenwolf gab einst die Mysterien der Heiltränke und die Geheimnisse magischer Sagen weiter. Er hat sie gelehrt, in geworfenen Runen die Vergangenheit und die Zukunft zu sehen, Stürme hinabzurufen und mächtige Talismane zu schnitzen."
languages.original_text: "Lakkan the Runed Wolf once shared the mysteries of the healing potions and the secrets of magic sagas. He taught them to see the past and future in thrown runes, to call down storms, and to carve powerful talismans."

traits.locale_text: "Lakkan der Runenwolf gab einst die Mysterien der Heiltränke und die Geheimnisse magischer Sagen weiter. Er hat sie gelehrt, in geworfenen Runen die Vergangenheit und die Zukunft zu sehen, Stürme hinabzurufen und mächtige Talismane zu schnitzen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Lakkan, le loup Runique, a autrefois partagé le mystère des potions de soin et les secrets des sagas magiques. Il nous a appris à voir le passé et le futur dans des runes, à appeler des tempêtes et à graver de puissants talismans. »
languages.original_text: "Lakkan the Runed Wolf once shared the mysteries of the healing potions and the secrets of magic sagas. He taught them to see the past and future in thrown runes, to call down storms, and to carve powerful talismans."

traits.locale_text: « Lakkan, le loup Runique, a autrefois partagé le mystère des potions de soin et les secrets des sagas magiques. Il nous a appris à voir le passé et le futur dans des runes, à appeler des tempêtes et à graver de puissants talismans. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Lakkan the Runed Wolf once shared the mysteries of the healing potions and the secrets of magic sagas. He taught them to see the past and future in thrown runes, to call down storms, and to carve powerful talismans."

languages.text: "Rün Kurdu Lakkan, bir keresinde şifa iksirlerinin gizemini ve büyü destanlarının sırlarını bizimle paylaşmıştı. Rün atarak geçmiş ve geleceği görelim, fırtınaları dindirelim ve güçlü nazarlıklar oyalım diye onları bize öğretmişti."
languages.original_text: "Lakkan the Runed Wolf once shared the mysteries of the healing potions and the secrets of magic sagas. He taught them to see the past and future in thrown runes, to call down storms, and to carve powerful talismans."

traits.locale_text: "Rün Kurdu Lakkan bir keresinde şifa iksirlerinin gizemini ve büyü destanlarının sırlarını bizimle paylaşmıştı. Rün atarak geçmiş ve geleceği görmek, fırtınaları dindirmek ve güçlü tılsımlar oymak için onları bize öğretmişti."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
